document_title: What is hair loss? 15 Common causes and signs
subsection_content:
To accurately diagnose the cause of hair loss, doctors will:
Discuss family medical history; Health status of the patient; Blood tests to check thyroid function and blood iron levels.; Check the scalp for signs of infection.; Scalp biopsy to check for skin diseases.
